text: Peş az tu ej Rasul, ʙisjor pajomʙarone ʙa sūi qavmaşon firistodaem, to onhoro da'vat namojand va ʙar ozori onho saʙru toqat kunand. Az onho dostoni ʙa'zero ʙarojat guftaem va dostoni ʙa'zero naguftaem. Va hama pajomʙaron amr şuda ʙudand, ki vahji ilohiro ʙa qavmaşon ʙirasonand. Va heç pajomʙarero nasazad, ki mū'çizae ʙijovarad, magar ʙa farmoni Alloh. Va cun farmoni Alloh ʙaroi azoʙi takziʙkunandagon darrasad, mijoni pajomʙaron va durūƣʙarovardagonaşon ʙarhaq dovarī gardad va onon, ki ʙar ʙotil ʙudaand, on ço zijon xohand did
